description:
Calculated - Total score based on an 8-item questionnaires ranking likelihood of dozing off [Johns MW 1991 (PubMed ID: 1798888)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1798888). Scale 0-3 for individual items; 0 to 24 for overall score. There are three categories: <10=normal, ?10=sleepy, ?18=very sleepy.

[Search for all ESS variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/stages/variables?search=epworth)
